There are lots of rooms to choose from. View the Room Guide

Important Attendee Info:
  • Each attendee must bring two unique, unopened bottles of whisky to attend.
  • Your ticket includes all food and drink for the weekend, other than the two bottles of whisky each attendee has to bring.
  • All private bedrooms and full-size beds in shared rooms include attendance for two people. You can book them for yourself or bring a +1, up to you.
  • Kathy’s Cabin includes the entire cabin (which can technically sleep 3 people).
